item.description:
We will discuss The Audacity of Hope: Thoughts on Reclaiming the American Dream by Barack Obama on Saturday, October 3, 3:00 PM until 5:00 PM. We will meet at Doug Peary's home in North Haven which is 1.6 miles from our usual meeting place, USNH.

In addition to the printed book, there is also a six hour audio version, read by Barack Obama. You can either listen to the audiobook or read the print version. There are lots of copies of both the audio recording and the book at public libraries as well as bookstores and online. Please bring a snack to share. As always, feel free to invite a friend or two.

This link will take you to the book at amazon.com:
http://www.amazon.com...

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.how_to_find_us: The third house before the end of the street, number 63 is a white single-story home with black trim.
item.name: Book Discussion - "The Audacity of Hope" by Barack Obama
